titleStmt.title: Century 3. Numb. 20 The nevvs for this vveek from Norimberg, Frankford and Holland Wherein (amongst other things) is contained, these remarkable passages following: the great preparation of the King of Poland against the Turke. Some things done by the French in Italie. The Weymarish have pillaged all the merchants goods of Frankford, which were going to Collen. The retreat of Banniers army out of Bohemia, towards Misnia, with his flighting of the places he held there, and the feare they apprehend at Lipsick of his approach that way. Something from Brazil, and something from the low Countreys, and from France, and Denmark.
Century 3. Numb. 20 The news for this week from Norimberg, Frankford and Holland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Harper?] for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: With this number the earlier practice of printing all the week's news in one number instead of several is re-established, and the series returns to 50 numbers instead of 100.
Identified as STC 18750 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
